thread.title: Liverpool target Christian Pulisic signs contract extension at Borussia Dortmund
thread.title_full: Liverpool target Christian Pulisic signs contract extension at Borussia Dortmund

author: Alex Richards
title: Liverpool target Christian Pulisic signs contract extension at Borussia Dortmund
text:
Sport Liverpool target Christian Pulisic signs contract extension at Borussia Dortmund The American starlet has inked a new deal until 2020 after an impressive second term at the Westfalenstadion Share Pulisic has signed a new deal with the German side (Photo: Alexandre Simoes) Share Get Liverpool FC   Could   
Borussia Dortmund winger Christian Pulisic has signed a new contract at the Westfalenstadion. 
The United States international has inked a deal until 2020 with the German club. 
Dortmund starlet Pulisic, 18, has been a long-time target for Liverpool, with Jurgen Klopp keen on taking him to Anfield. 
The Reds saw a £11million move for the youngster turned down last summer. However BVB have continually reiterated their stance that Pulisic is not for sale, with general manager Michael Zorc declaring last month: "We have communicated very clearly that we won't sell Christian and that he's very much part of our plans. Liverpool don't need to waste time. They can save their money.” Pulisic in Champions League action against Real Madrid (Photo: 2016 Getty Images) Read More Transfer news LIVE: All the latest from the January window 
Now, after a strong season, where he has seen regular action - featuring 19 times despite competition from the likes of Ousmane Dembele, Andre Schurrle, Marco Reus and Emre Mor - he has now been handed a new deal. 
"Christian is already an important figure within the team and, like Julian Weigl, set to become a cornerstone of our sporting future," said Zorc. 
"I still have a lot to learn," says Pulisic. "Here in Dortmund I find are the best conditions for me. And here I have the chance to play in front of over 80,000 spectators. We have the best fans in the world - it can not be better." 
His development has continued to accelerate under Thomas Tuchel this term and now he has signed improved terms, with a year extension on top. 
Pulisic's renewal comes after BVB fought off competition from Real Madrid to sign Swedish sensation Alexander Isak. 
The 17-year-old has joined in an £8.6million move from AIK. Read More
